overview: Samantha is living a life of fear and abuse under her wicked husband Doug. But her life is flipped upside down when sheâ€™s taken hostage by a small group of outlaws. On the run and desperately seeking refuge, the daring group of bandits hit the road with Samantha as their cargo. But what none of them expected, is how fate would choose them to band together for an incredible adventure.
title: Caged and Wild
